subject: Hockey, Ice
NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
lead_paragraph: Justin Kloos scored twice and Adam Wilcox made 24 saves to help top-seeded Minnesota beat St. Cloud State, 4-0, in the N.C.A.A. West Regional final in St. Paul.
snippet: Justin Kloos scored twice and Adam Wilcox made 24 saves to help top-seeded Minnesota beat St. Cloud State, 4-0, in the N.C.A.A. West Regional final in St. Paul.
